title: Another Teaser for 'American Primeval' Brutal 1800s Western Series
description: "America... like never before." Netflix has debuted another vivid 45-second teaser trailer for their epic new western series called American Primeval, made by filmmaker Peter Berg and writer / producer Mark L. Smith. It's about the gritty & adventurous exploration of the birth of the American West. This intense, brutal new western series with 6 episodes launches streaming on Netflix in January 2025 in just another week. American Primeval stars Taylor Kitsch, Betty Gilpin, Dane DeHaan, Saura Lightfoot-Leon, Derek Hinkey, Joe Tippett, Jai Courtney, Preston Mota, Shawnee Pourier, and Shea Whigham. Julie O'Keefe is the Indigenous Cultural Consultant and Project Advisor. Netflix describes it further as: "This is America…1857. Up is down, pain is everywhere, innocence and tranquility are losing the battle to hatred and fear. Peace is the shrinking minority, and very few possess grace — even fewer know compassion..." Indeed. Berg's "American Primeval is a fictionalized dramatization & examination of the violent collision of culture, religion, and community as men and women fight and die to keep or control this land." Sounds thrilling and harrowing - and it sounds like not much has changed in 200 years in America. Check out this footage below. Here's an additional teaser […]
author: Alex Billington

text: by December 26, 2024Source: YouTube "America... like never before." Netflix has debuted another vivid 45-second teaser trailer for their epic new western series called American Primeval, made by filmmaker Peter Berg and writer / producer Mark L. Smith. It's about the gritty & adventurous exploration of the birth of the American West. This intense, brutal new western series with 6 episodes launches streaming on Netflix in January 2025 in just another week. American Primeval stars Taylor Kitsch, Betty Gilpin, Dane DeHaan, Saura Lightfoot-Leon, Derek Hinkey, Joe Tippett, Jai Courtney, Preston Mota, Shawnee Pourier, and Shea Whigham. Julie O'Keefe is the Indigenous Cultural Consultant and Project Advisor. Netflix describes it further as: "This is America…1857. Up is down, pain is everywhere, innocence and tranquility are losing the battle to hatred and fear. Peace is the shrinking minority, and very few possess grace — even fewer know compassion..." Indeed. Berg's "American Primeval is a fictionalized dramatization & examination of the violent collision of culture, religion, and community as men and women fight and die to keep or control this land." Sounds thrilling and harrowing - and it sounds like not much has changed in 200 years in America. Check out this footage below. Here's an additional teaser trailer for Peter Berg's series American Primeval, from Netflix's YouTube: You can watch the full official trailer + featurette for Berg's American Primeval series right here for more. A new limited series from Peter Berg's Film 44. This is America...1857. Up is down, pain is everywhere, innocence and tranquility are losing the battle to hatred and fear. Peace is the shrinking minority, and very few possess grace — even fewer know compassion. There is no safe haven in these brutal lands, and only one goal matters: survival. American Primeval is a fictionalized dramatization and examination of the violent collision of culture, religion, community as men & women fight and die to keep or control this land. American Primeval is a series directed by the American filmmaker Peter Berg, director of many big movies The Rundown, Friday Night Lights, The Kingdom, Hancock, Battleship, Lone Survivor, Deepwater Horizon, Patriots Day, Mile 22, Spenser Confidential, and episodes of "Boys in Blue" & "Painkiller" series. The series is written and created by Mark L. Smith. Produced by Film 44 and Grand Electric. Executive produced by Eric Newman, Peter Berg, Mark L. Smith, Alex Gayner. Netflix will debut American Primeval streaming on Netflix worldwide starting January 9th, 2025 just after the New Year. What do you think? Find more posts in: Streaming, To Watch, Trailer
html:
by
December 26, 2024
Source: YouTube

"America... like never before." Netflix has debuted another vivid 45-second teaser trailer for their epic new western series called American Primeval, made by filmmaker Peter Berg and writer / producer Mark L. Smith. It's about the gritty & adventurous exploration of the birth of the American West. This intense, brutal new western series with 6 episodes launches streaming on Netflix in January 2025 in just another week. American Primeval stars Taylor Kitsch, Betty Gilpin, Dane DeHaan, Saura Lightfoot-Leon, Derek Hinkey, Joe Tippett, Jai Courtney, Preston Mota, Shawnee Pourier, and Shea Whigham. Julie O'Keefe is the Indigenous Cultural Consultant and Project Advisor. Netflix describes it further as: "This is America…1857. Up is down, pain is everywhere, innocence and tranquility are losing the battle to hatred and fear. Peace is the shrinking minority, and very few possess grace — even fewer know compassion..." Indeed. Berg's "American Primeval is a fictionalized dramatization & examination of the violent collision of culture, religion, and community as men and women fight and die to keep or control this land." Sounds thrilling and harrowing - and it sounds like not much has changed in 200 years in America. Check out this footage below.

Here's an additional teaser trailer for Peter Berg's series American Primeval, from Netflix's YouTube:

You can watch the full official trailer + featurette for Berg's American Primeval series right here for more.

A new limited series from Peter Berg's Film 44. This is America...1857. Up is down, pain is everywhere, innocence and tranquility are losing the battle to hatred and fear. Peace is the shrinking minority, and very few possess grace — even fewer know compassion. There is no safe haven in these brutal lands, and only one goal matters: survival. American Primeval is a fictionalized dramatization and examination of the violent collision of culture, religion, community as men & women fight and die to keep or control this land. American Primeval is a series directed by the American filmmaker Peter Berg, director of many big movies The Rundown, Friday Night Lights, The Kingdom, Hancock, Battleship, Lone Survivor, Deepwater Horizon, Patriots Day, Mile 22, Spenser Confidential, and episodes of "Boys in Blue" & "Painkiller" series. The series is written and created by Mark L. Smith. Produced by Film 44 and Grand Electric. Executive produced by Eric Newman, Peter Berg, Mark L. Smith, Alex Gayner. Netflix will debut American Primeval streaming on Netflix worldwide starting January 9th, 2025 just after the New Year. What do you think?

Find more posts in: Streaming, To Watch, Trailer
